results.byline: By Charlie Savage and Alan Feuer
results.title: Judge Overrules Special Master’s Demands to Trump in Document Review
results.abstract: The dueling moves by Judge Aileen M. Cannon and a special master she appointed reflected a larger struggle over who should control the rules of the review — and whom those rules would favor.

media.caption: Lawyers for former President Donald J. Trump had objected to several of the special master’s requirements.

results.title: DeSantis, Once a ‘No’ on Storm Aid, Petitions a President He’s Bashed
results.abstract: The Florida governor, who as a congressman opposed aid to victims of Hurricane Sandy, is seeking relief from the Biden administration as Hurricane Ian ravages his own state.

media.caption: Governor Ron DeSantis discussing Hurricane Ian Monday in Largo, Fla.

results.adx_keywords: Midterm Elections (2022);United States Politics and Government;United States Defense and Military Forces;Drunken and Reckless Driving;Elections, House of Representatives;Majewski, J R;Republican Party;Associated Press;Ohio
results.title: House Candidate’s Claims About His Military Record Unravel Further
results.abstract: J.R. Majewski promotes himself to Ohio voters as a combat veteran, but the Air Force has no record of it. Now, there is evidence he was demoted for drunken driving.
des_facet: United States Defense and Military Forces

media.caption: J.R. Majewski discussed his military record last week in Holland, Ohio. The Associated Press has since reported that the Air Force demoted him in 2001 for driving drunk on an air base.
media.copyright: Phillip L. Kaplan/The Blade, via Associated Press

results.adx_keywords: Rap and Hip-Hop;PnB Rock (1991-2022);California
results.title: Father and Teenage Son Are Charged in Killing of Rapper PnB Rock
results.abstract: The district attorney in Los Angeles County said that the suspects’ actions had “dimmed a bright light in the lives of his fans, friends and most importantly his family.”

media.caption: PnB Rock, whose legal name was Rakim Allen, was shot dead during a robbery at a restaurant in South Los Angeles on Sept. 12.

results.adx_keywords: Television;Comedy and Humor;Noah, Trevor (1984- )
results.title: Trevor Noah Announces He Will Leave ‘The Daily Show’
results.abstract: During a taping of the Comedy Central program Thursday night, he noted that it has been seven years since he replaced Jon Stewart. He will depart at a time to be determined, he said.

media.caption: Trevor Noah was a 31-year-old South African comic not yet well known in the United States when he became the host of one of the crown jewels of the Comedy Central lineup.

results.title: On Florida’s Islands, Scenes of Paradise Lost, Maybe for Good
results.abstract: On Fort Myers Beach, Sanibel Island and Pine Island, cherished landmarks and an easygoing existence were obliterated by Hurricane Ian.

media.caption: Rescue workers in Fort Myers Beach on Thursday.
media.copyright: Hilary Swift for The New York Times

results.title: With Mortgage Rates Soaring, the Housing Market Takes Another Hit
results.abstract: As the average 30-year mortgage rate eclipses 7 percent, home buyers and sellers are confronting sticker shock.
org_facet: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)

media.caption: The added borrowing costs are dragging down the market, said Danielle Hale, the chief economist at Realtor.com: “I can’t tell you how many times I’ve thought, ‘I’m so glad I’m not trying to buy a home right now.’”

results.title: An Unconfirmed Death Toll Estimate From Lee County Spread Widely
results.abstract: There is no official estimate of the number of people killed by Hurricane Ian in Lee County or across Florida.

media.caption: A boat was partially submerged in the aftermath of Hurricane Ian in Punta Gorda, Fla., on Thursday.

results.title: Facing a Dire Storm Forecast in Florida, Officials Delayed Evacuation
results.abstract: A day of hesitation in Lee County came despite warnings that the Fort Myers and Cape Coral area could see mass flooding. Now authorities are encountering mass death.

results.abstract: The latest shots, which target Omicron and its subvariants, could offer protection against a winter surge in cases. But many people are unsure if they’re eligible.

results.title: Hurricane Ian’s Toll Is Severe. Lack of Insurance Will Make It Worse.
results.abstract: In Florida’s hardest-hit counties, fewer than 1 in 5 homes have flood insurance. That means communities will struggle to rebuild, experts warn.

media.caption: A flooded area of Fort Myers, Fla., on Wednesday after Hurricane Ian passed through.

results.title: Dolphins’ Tua Tagovailoa Hospitalized After Second Head Hit in Two Games
results.abstract: Miami’s quarterback left Thursday’s game on a stretcher after his head was slammed to the turf for the second time in five days. The players’ union has asked for an investigation of his team’s handling of the concussion protocol.

media.caption: Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa was hit in the second quarter on Thursday night.

results.title: For Once, the Hurricane Shark Was Real
results.abstract: Shark memes have become synonymous with social media hoaxes. But an A.P. analysis and experts say a wayward finned creature was indeed captured on video swimming on a street in Fort Myers, Fla., this week.

results.adx_keywords: your-feed-science;Clinical Trials;Drugs (Pharmaceuticals);Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis;your-feed-healthcare;Cohen, Joshua B;Klee, Justin;Amylyx Pharmaceuticals Inc;Food and Drug Administration;United States
results.title: F.D.A. Approves A.L.S. Treatment Despite Questions About Effectiveness
results.abstract: The drug is safe, and one trial found it may extend survival and slow paralysis in functions like muscle control and speaking. A larger trial will be completed in 2024.

media.caption: The F.D.A.’s headquarters in Silver Spring, Md. Although the agency’s own reviewers said there wasn’t enough evidence that an experimental medication, AMX0035, works for A.L.S, the F.D.A. approved it, citing the drug’s safety and patients’ desperate need for treatments.
media.copyright: Stefani Reynolds for The New York Times

results.title: The Last, Painful Days of Anthony Bourdain
results.abstract: A new, unauthorized biography reveals intimate, often raw, details of the TV star’s life, including his tumultuous relationship with the Italian actor Asia Argento. And it’s drawing criticism from many of his friends and family.
